item.title: CVE-2021-25008|2024-08-03T19:49:14.599Z -- unknown -- code%20snippets
item.description: The Code Snippets WordPress plugin before 2.14.3 does not escape the snippets-safe-mode parameter before outputting it back in attributes, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
